title: Greyson Chance - Waiting Outside The Lines
description:
Chance was born on August 16, 1997[1][2] in Wichita Falls, Texas and now resides in Edmond, Oklahoma.[3] He is the youngest child of Scott and Lisa Chance; he has a 16-year-old sister, Alexa, and a 19-year-old brother, Tanner, both of whom also play music.[8] Chance began playing the piano at the age of 8 and has had three years of piano lessons, but no formal vocal training. His inspiration comes from Lady Gaga; after seeing her performance of "Paparazzi" at the 2009 MTV Video Music Awards, he said: ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œI was awestruck by her performance.
